info.title: JioSaavan Unofficial API
info.description: A lightweight and easy-to-use Cloudflare worker built with Hono.jsðŸ”¥ lets developers get data directly from JioSaavn without having to use web scraping.

get.summary: Retrieve an album by ID or link
get.description: Retrieve an album by providing either an ID or a direct link to the album on JioSaavn.

schema.description: The unique ID of the album
schema.title: Album ID

schema.description: A direct link to the album on JioSaavn
schema.title: Album Link

success.description: Indicates the success status of the request.

data.description: The detailed information of the album.
data.title: Album Details

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid query parameters.

404.description: The album could not be found with the provided ID or link.

get.summary: Retrieve artists by ID or link
get.description: Retrieve artists by ID or by a direct artist link.

schema.description: Artist ID
schema.title: Artist ID

schema.description: A direct link to the artist on JioSaavn
schema.title: Artist Link

schema.description: page number
schema.title: Page number

schema.description: Number of songs to fetch
schema.title: Song count

schema.description: Number of albums to fetch
schema.title: Album count

schema.description: sort by
schema.title: Sort by

schema.description: sort order
schema.title: Sort order

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

schema.description: ID of the artist to retrieve
schema.title: Artist ID

schema.description: The page number of the results to retrieve
schema.title: Page number

schema.description: The number of songs to retrieve for the artist
schema.title: Song count

schema.description: The number of albums to retrieve for the artist
schema.title: Album count

schema.description: The field to sort the results by
schema.title: Sort by

schema.description: The order to sort the results by
schema.title: Sort order

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

404.description: Artist not found for the given ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of songs for a given artist by their ID, with optional sorting and pagination.

schema.description: ID of the artist to retrieve the songs for
The page number of the results to retrieve
The criterion to sort the songs by
The order to sort the songs

200.description: Successful response with a list of songs for the artist

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

data.description: An array of songs associated with the artist

404.description: Artist not found for the given ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of albums for a given artist by their ID, with optional sorting and pagination.

schema.description: ID of the artist to retrieve the albums for
The page number of the results to retrieve
The criterion to sort the albums by
The order to sort the albums

200.description: Successful response with a list of albums for the artist

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

data.description: An array of albums associated with the artist

404.description: Artist not found for the given ID

get.summary: Retrieve track by ID or link
get.description: Retrieve tracks by a comma-separated list of IDs

schema.description: Comma-separated list of track IDs
schema.title: Track IDs

schema.description: A direct link to the track on JioSaavn
schema.title: Track Link

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

400.description: Bad request when query parameters are missing or invalid

404.description: Track not found with the given ID or link

get.description: Retrieve a track by its ID. Optionally, include lyrics in the response.

schema.description: ID of the track to retrieve
schema.title: Track ID

schema.description: Include lyrics in the response
schema.title: Include lyrics

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

400.description: Bad request when query parameters are missing or invalid

404.description: Track not found for the given ID

get.description: Retrieve the lyrics for a track by its ID.

schema.description: ID of the track to retrieve the lyrics for

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

404.description: Lyrics not found for the given track ID

get.description: Retrieve track suggestions based on the given track ID. This can be used to get similar track to the one provided for infinite playback.

schema.description: ID of the track to retrieve suggestions for
Limit the number of suggestions to retrieve
schema.title: Limit

success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful

get.description: Search for songs, albums, artists, and playlists based on the provided query string.

schema.description: Search query
schema.title: Search query

success.description: Indicates whether the search was successful

data.description: Search results including songs, albums, artists, and playlists

get.description: Search for songs based on the provided query

schema.description: Search query for songs
schema.title: Search query

schema.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve
schema.title: Page Number

schema.description: Number of search results per page
schema.title: Limit

200.description: Successful response with song search results

success.description: Indicates whether the song search was successful

get.description: Search for albums based on the provided query

schema.description: Search query for albums
The page number of the search results to retrieve
The number of search results per page

200.description: Successful response with album search results

success.description: Indicates whether the album search was successful

get.description: Search for artists based on the provided query

schema.description: Search query for artists
schema.title: Search query

schema.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve
schema.title: Page Number

schema.description: Number of search results per page
schema.title: Limit

200.description: Successful response with artist search results

success.description: Indicates whether the artist search was successful

get.description: Search for playlists based on the provided query

schema.description: Search query for playlists
schema.title: Search query

schema.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve
schema.title: Page Number

schema.description: Number of search results per page
schema.title: Limit

200.description: Successful response with playlist search results

success.description: Indicates whether the playlist search was successful

get.summary: Retrieve a playlist by ID or link
get.description: Retrieve a playlist by providing either an ID or a direct link to the playlist on JioSaavn.

schema.description: The unique ID of the playlist
schema.title: Playlist ID

schema.description: A direct link to the playlist on JioSaavn
schema.title: Playlist Link

schema.description: The page number of the songs to retrieve from the playlist
schema.title: Page Number

schema.description: Number of songs to retrieve per page
schema.title: Limit

success.description: Indicates the success status of the request.

data.description: The detailed information of the playlist.
data.title: Playlist Details

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid query parameters.

404.description: The playlist could not be found with the provided ID or link.
